cards.title: Arsenal
powers: {Arsenal} deals 1 target 1 melee or projectile damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card.
One hero may use a power.
Increase the next melee or projectile damage dealt by a hero by 2.

openingLines.default: Destiny has placed me here to stop you!
openingLines.DrEchidnaCharacter: Did you forget? I'm a monster hunter.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: This is it, the final battle! I'm ready!

cards.title: Call to Arms
body: Search your deck for a Relic and put it into play or your hand. Shuffle your deck. {Arsenal} deals 1 target 1 melee or 1 projectile damage.

cards.title: Dismember
body: {Arsenal} deals 1 target 1 melee damage. If a character card is dealt damage this way, destroy one of its Ongoing cards. If a non-character card is reduced to 4 or less HP this way, destroy it.

cards.title: Fastball Special
body: {Arsenal} deals 1 target 1 melee damage. That target deals up to 3 other targets 1 melee damage each.

cards.title: Flawless Aim
cards.flavorText: I've got my shot lined up.

cards.title: Fragarach
body: Increase melee damage dealt by {Arsenal} by 1. The first time each turn {Arsenal} deals a target melee damage, it is irreducible. When this card enters play, return all but 2 of your relics from your play area to your hand.

flavorQuotes.text: This is a problem you{br}can't solve!
I have an answer to that.

cards.title: Gae Bulg
body: Increase projectile dealt by {Arsenal} by 1. The first time each turn {Arsenal} deals a target projectile damage, that target deals itself 2 toxic damage. When this card enters play, return all but 2 of your relics from your play area to your hand.
cards.flavorText: This thing is awful, who made this!?

cards.title: Giant Slayer
body: Increase damage dealt by {Arsenal} to non-hero targets with more HP than her by 1.

cards.title: Impaling Shot
body: {Arsenal} deals 1 target 1 projectile damage. Prevent the next damage dealt by that target.
cards.flavorText: I've got it pinned down. Literally.

cards.title: Laevateinn
body: Increase projectile damage dealt by {Arsenal} by 1. The first time each turn {Arsenal} deals a target projectile damage, if that target has 2 or less HP remaining, destroy it. When this card enters play, return all but 2 of your relics from your play area to your hand.

cards.title: Perfect Parry
body: When {Arsenal} would be dealt damage by a non-hero target, you may prevent that damage. If you do, {Arsenal} deals the source of that damage 1 melee damage, then destroy this card.

cards.title: Ready Shot
body: When a non-hero target enters play, {Arsenal} may deal that target 2 projectile damage. If damage is dealt this way, destroy this card.

cards.title: Ruyi Jingu Bang
body: Increase melee damage dealt by {Arsenal} by 1. The first time each turn {Arsenal} deals a target melee damage, she may deal 1 other target 1 melee damage. When this card enters play, return all but 2 of your relics from your play area to your hand.
cards.flavorText: It's big, but I can do big too.

cards.title: Seismic Strike
body: {Arsenal} deals 1 target 2 melee damage. Destroy an environment card.

cards.title: Sharur
body: Increase projectile damage dealt by {Arsenal} by 1. The first time each turn {Arsenal} deals a target projectile damage, reveal and replace the top card of a deck. When this card enters play, return all but 2 of your relics from your play area to your hand.
cards.flavorText: Do I need to give you a plan again?

cards.title: Taming Sari
body: Increase melee damage dealt by {Arsenal} by 1. The first time each turn {Arsenal} deals a target melee damage, reduce damage dealt to {Arsenal} by 1 until the start of your next turn. When this card enters play, return all but 2 of your relics from your play area to your hand.
cards.flavorText: I will take that blade for myself

cards.title: Uchide no Kozuchi
body: Increase melee damage dealt by {Arsenal} by 1. The first time each turn {Arsenal} deals a target melee damage, draw a card. When this card enters play, return all but 2 of your relics from your play area to your hand.
cards.flavorText: I wish for the key to these shackles!

cards.title: Vijaya
body: Increase projectile damage dealt by {Arsenal} by 1. The first time each turn {Arsenal} deals a target projectile damage, she deals each non-hero target 1 sonic damage. When this card enters play, return all but 2 of your relics from your play area to your hand.

cards.title: Volley Fire
body: {Arsenal} deals each non-hero target 1 projectile damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Let's see them fight in the shade!

cards.title: Combat Training
body: Draw 2 cards. {Arsenal} deals 1 target 1 melee or projectile damage.
cards.flavorText: I need a replacement dummy, this one's broken.
